SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.araneaframework.core.annotation
Annotation Type EnvironmnetEntry

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface EnvironmnetEntry

A field-level annotation for setting the appropriate environment entry. The entry key is by default the field type, or the class as specified in value().

Since:
2.0
Author:
Martti Tamm (martti@araneaframework.org)

Required Element Summary
 boolean required
          Specifies whether the environment entry is required.
 Class<?> value
          An optional parameter to the Environment entry lookup.
 

Element Detail

value

public abstract Class<?> value
An optional parameter to the Environment entry lookup. Uses the given class as the environment entry lookup key. By default, it can use the field type.

Returns:
The key to use for environment entry lookup

required

public abstract boolean required
Specifies whether the environment entry is required. By default, it is not required.

Returns:
A Boolean indicating whether the field is required.
